item.description:
Join me for a drink on the roof deck at Central 37. (Central 37 is the old Black Rhino.)

I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear something GREEN, so that it'll be easy to fnd the group.

There will be no group tab. Please maintain your own tab, or pay as you go. People will be arriving and leaving at different times, so a group tab does not work out well.

I'll get there around 5:15pm and I'll stay for a couple of hours; however, feel free to come and go as you please.

Check out Central 37's website for more info:

http://www.central37b...

See ya there! Wear something GREEN please!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a GREEN shirt. Everyone will wear something GREEN
item.name: Roof Deck at Central 37 - Wear Green
